forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 14 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight descends upon Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a distinct crispness, tracing its lineage from the rolling coastal winds. Currently, a partly cloudy sky shrouds the horizon, with a low hovering gently around 53 degrees. The brisk west-southwest breeze whistles through the streets, occasionally stirring up a flurry of leaves. The city pulses with its usual rhythm, though the winds, reaching up to 24 mph, cast a lively touch on the evening’s ambiance.

Looking ahead to tomorrow, the forecast hints at a day saturated in sunshine, a commodity cherished amid the varied moods of San Francisco weather. The high temperature, nudging close to 66 degrees and easing into a cooler afternoon, invites a leisurely pace. For those contemplating plans, layering becomes paramount; a light jacket over a comfortable shirt will carry you gracefully through the warmth of midday and into the chillier embrace of evening. Perhaps a wandering stroll along the waterfront or a coffee at an outdoor café would best suit the day, allowing one to bask in the transition from the vibrant canvas above to the bustling life below.
